My first commercial project, I was with GoFriends . A Bootstrap themed admin panel for a game called Golden Eggs. Golden Eggs is a mobile game where users manage a chicken farm and can make real money. Administrators are able to view player details, view player farm ,check deposits and withdrawals, delete and edit players ,view overall status of the game and general admin function.
